segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, reaching up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems quite happy to be getting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their mischievous fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's aware of the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she's ready to catch him if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, working together to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they would do if they heard their mother coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Would they try to hide, or would they just freeze in place?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about them getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
